TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Menu extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class Menu Inherits HierarchicalDataBoundControl Implements INamingContainer, IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class Menu : System::Web::UI::WebControls::HierarchicalDataBoundControl, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 顯示 ASP.NET Web 網頁中的功能表。

span.span: Displays a menu in an ASP.NET Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [功能表項目Menu Items](#menu_items) - [靜態資料Static Data](#static_data) - [繫結至資料Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 用來在 ASP.NET Web 網頁中顯示的功能表控制項，以及通常用於搭配控制項瀏覽的網站。The control is used to display a menu in an ASP.NET Web page and is often used in combination with a control for navigating a Web site. 控制項支援下列功能：The control supports the following features: - 資料繫結，讓繫結至階層式資料來源控制項的功能表項目。Data binding that allows the control's menu items to be bound to hierarchal data sources. - 站台瀏覽與整合控制項。Site navigation through integration with the control. - 以程式設計方式存取物件模型，以動態方式建立功能表、 填入功能表項目、 設定屬性，以及等等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically create menus, populate menu items, set properties, and so on. - 透過佈景主題、 使用者定義的映像、 樣式和使用者定義的範本自訂外觀。Customizable appearance through themes, user-defined images, styles, and user-defined templates. 當使用者按一下功能表項目，控制項可以瀏覽至連結的網頁，或直接張貼至伺服器。When the user clicks a menu item, the control can either navigate to a linked Web page or simply post back to the server. 如果設定功能表項目的屬性，控制項巡覽至連結的網頁; 否則它會張貼頁面回傳至伺服器進行處理。If the property of a menu item is set, the control navigates to the linked page; otherwise, it posts the page back to the server for processing. 根據預設，連結的頁面會顯示在相同的視窗或框架做為控制項。By default, a linked page is displayed in the same window or frame as the control. 若要在不同的視窗或框架中顯示連結的內容，請使用屬性控制項。To display the linked content in a different window or frame, use the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會影響在控制項中的每個功能表項目。The property affects every menu item in the control. 若要指定視窗或框架的個別功能表項目，設定屬性直接物件。To specify a window or frame for an individual menu item, set the property of the object directly. 控制項顯示功能表的兩種： 靜態功能表和動態功能表。The control displays two types of menus: a static menu and a dynamic menu. 一律會以顯示靜態功能表控制項。The static menu is always displayed in a control. 根據預設，會顯示在靜態功能表中的根層級 （層級 0） 的功能表項目。By default, the menu items at the root level (level 0) are displayed in the static menu. 您可以在靜態功能表內顯示更多的功能表層級 （靜態子功能表），藉由設定屬性。You can display additional menu levels (static submenus) within the static menu by setting the property. 功能表的項目 （如果有的話） 較高的層級所指定的值比屬性會顯示在動態功能表中。Menu items (if any) with a higher level than the value specified by the property are displayed in a dynamic menu. 動態功能表會顯示只有當使用者將滑鼠指標停留包含動態子功能表的父功能表項目。A dynamic menu appears only when the user positions the mouse pointer over the parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 動態功能表會在特定期間之後會自動地消失。Dynamic menus automatically disappear after a certain duration. 使用屬性，以指定的持續時間。Use the property to specify the duration. > [!NOTE] > 當使用者按一下功能表之外，也會消失動態功能表。A dynamic menu also disappears when the user clicks outside of the menu. 您也可以限制藉由設定顯示在動態功能表中的層級數目屬性。You can also limit the number of levels displayed in a dynamic menu by setting the property. 功能表層級高於指定的值都會被捨棄。Menu levels higher than the specified value are discarded. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不是在內部使用控制項。The control is not designed to be used inside an control. 您可以加入外的網頁控制項控制項。You can add the control only to a page outside an control. 控制項用來更新選取的區域，而不是整個頁面更新與回傳的頁面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 功能表項目Menu Items A控制項所組成的樹狀目錄中的功能表項目所代表物件。A control is made up of a tree of menu items represented by objects. 在最上層 （層級 0） 的功能表項目稱為根功能表項目。Menu items at the top level (level 0) are called root menu items. 功能表項目具有父功能表項目稱為子功能表項目。A menu item that has a parent menu item is called a child menu item. 所有根功能表項目會都儲存在集合。All root menu items are stored in the collection. 子功能表項目會儲存在父功能表項目的集合。Child menu items are stored in a parent menu item's collection. 每個功能表項目具有和屬性。Each menu item has a and a property. 值屬性顯示在控制項，而屬性用來儲存功能表項目相關的任何其他資料，例如資料傳遞至功能表項目相關聯的回傳事件。The value of the property is displayed in the control, while the property is used to store any additional data about the menu item, such as data passed to the postback event associated with the menu item. 按一下時，功能表項目可以瀏覽至所指定的另一個網頁屬性。When clicked, a menu item can navigate to another Web page indicated by the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性未設定的功能表項目，控制項只送出至伺服器進行處理時按一下功能表項目頁面。If the property is not set for a menu item, the control simply submits the page to the server for processing when the menu item is clicked. 您也可以顯示功能表項目中映像，藉由設定屬性。You can also optionally display an image in a menu item by setting the property. 功能表項目上的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on menu items, see . ## 靜態資料Static Data 最簡單的資料模型的控制項是靜態功能表項目。The simplest data model of the control is static menu items. 若要顯示使用宣告式語法的靜態功能表項目，第一次建立巢狀開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To display static menu items using declarative syntax, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下來，建立巢狀結構的功能表結構``開頭和結尾之間的項目``標記。Next, create the menu structure by nesting `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags. 每個``元素代表控制項中的功能表項目，並將對應至物件。Each `` element represents a menu item in the control and maps to a object. 您可以藉由設定的屬性來設定每個功能表項目的屬性及其``項目。You can set the properties of each menu item by setting the attributes of its `` element. 若要建立子功能表項目，巢狀其他``開頭和結尾之間的項目``父功能表項目的標記。To create submenu items, nest additional `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags of the parent menu item. ## 繫結至資料Binding to Data 控制項可以使用任何階層式資料來源控制項，例如控制項或控制項。The control can use any hierarchal data source control, such as an control or a control. 若要繫結至階層的資料來源控制項，將屬性控制權傳輸至資料來源控制項的值。To bind to a hierarchal data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 這是慣用的方法繫結至資料。This is the preferred method to bind to data. 當繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目都包含多個屬性 （例如 XML 項目具有多個屬性），功能表項目會顯示所傳回的值`ToString`方法的預設資料的項目。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString` method of the data item by default. 在 XML 項目，功能表項目會顯示項目名稱，其中顯示功能表樹狀結構的基礎結構，不過沒有非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the menu tree but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以使用功能表項目繫結至特定資料的項目屬性來指定功能表項目繫結的集合。You can bind a menu item to a specific data item property by using the collection to specify menu item bindings. 集合包含物件，定義資料項目及它所繫結功能表項目之間的關聯性。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to. 您可以指定要顯示的節點中的繫結和資料項目屬性的準則。You can specify the criteria for binding and the data item property to display in the node. 如需功能表項目繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on menu item bindings, see . 您無法建立空的節點中藉由設定控制或屬性為空字串 ("")。You cannot create empty nodes in a control by setting the or properties to the empty string (""). 為空字串中設定這些屬性具有未設定屬性相同的效果。Setting these properties to the empty string has the same effect as not setting the properties. 在此情況下，控制項可讓您建立使用預設繫結屬性。In that case, the control creates a default binding using the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface 有許多方法可自訂的外觀控制項。There are many ways to customize the appearance of the control. 首先，您可以指定是否呈現控制項水平或垂直藉由設定屬性。First, you can specify whether the control is rendered horizontally or vertically by setting the property. 您也可以指定不同的樣式 （例如 字型和色彩） 的每個功能表項目類型。You can also specify a different style (such as font size and color) for each of the menu item types. 如果您使用階層式樣式表 (CSS) 來自訂控制項的外觀，使用內嵌樣式或個別的 CSS 檔案，但非兩者。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of the control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 使用內嵌樣式和個別的 CSS 檔案，可能會造成非預期的結果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. 如需有關如何使用控制項的樣式表的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 伺服器控制項和 CSS 樣式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42)。For more information on using style sheets with controls, see [Web Server Controls and CSS Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/782c2db6-fc9b-4243-8df9-a8ffe2f4cc42). 下表列出可用的功能表項目樣式。The following table lists the available menu item styles. |功能表項目樣式屬性Menu item style property|描述Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||當滑鼠指標位於動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||個別的動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||針對動態功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||目前已選取動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||當滑鼠指標位於靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||個別靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||針對靜態功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a static menu.| ||目前選取的靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 而不是設定個別的樣式屬性，您可以指定套用至使用下列樣式集合，根據其層級的功能表項目的樣式。Instead of setting the individual style properties, you can specify styles that are applied to menu items based on their level by using the following style collections. |集合層級的樣式Level style collections|描述Description| |-----------------------------|-----------------| ||集合控制層級為基礎的功能表項目樣式的物件。A collection of objects that control the style of the menu items on a level basis.| ||集合選取功能表項目層級為基礎的物件可控制的樣式。A collection of objects that control the style of selected menu items on a level basis.| ||集合控制層級為基礎的子功能表項目樣式的物件。A collection of objects that control the style of the submenu items on a level basis.| 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至功能表樹狀結構中，第一個層級的功能表項目的樣式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the first depth level in the menu tree. 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至功能表樹狀目錄中，以此類推，第二個層級的功能表項目的樣式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the second depth level in the menu tree, and so on. 這是最常用來產生內容樣式導覽功能表的功能表項目在某些深度其中應該具有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子功能表。This is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用任何上述表格中所列的層級的樣式集合定義的樣式控制項，這些樣式設定會覆寫個別的功能表項目樣式屬性。If you use any of the level style collections listed in the previous table to define the style for the control, these style settings override the individual menu item style properties. 若要變更控制項的外觀的另一個方法是自訂映像中顯示控制項。Another way to alter the appearance of the control is to customize the images displayed in the control. 您可以指定自己的自訂映像不同的組件控制項的設定下表中顯示的屬性。You can specify your own custom image for the different parts of the control by setting the properties shown in the following table. |影像屬性Image property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||顯示在動態功能表項目底部，將它與其他功能表項目分開的選擇性影像。An optional image displayed at the bottom of a dynamic menu item to separate it from other menu items.| ||顯示在動態功能表項目來表示它具有子功能表中的選擇性影像。An optional image displayed in a dynamic menu item to indicate that it has a submenu.| ||顯示在動態功能表項目頂端，將它與其他功能表項目分開的選擇性影像。An optional image displayed at the top of a dynamic menu item to separate it from other menu items.| ||在功能表項目，表示使用者可以向上捲動到檢視其他功能表項目底部顯示的影像。The image displayed at the bottom of a menu item to indicate that the user can scroll down to view additional menu items.| ||頂端的功能表項目，表示使用者可以向上捲動檢視其他功能表項目顯示的影像。The image displayed at the top of a menu item to indicate that the user can scroll up to view additional menu items.| ||顯示在靜態功能表項目底部，將它與其他功能表項目分開的選擇性影像。An optional image displayed at the bottom of a static menu item to separate it from other menu items.| ||顯示在靜態功能表項目來表示它具有子功能表中的選擇性影像。An optional image displayed in a static menu item to indicate that it has a submenu.| ||顯示在靜態功能表項目頂端，將它與其他功能表項目分開的選擇性影像。An optional image displayed at the top of a static menu item to separate it from other menu items.| 完全控制使用者介面 (UI)，您可以定義您自己的自訂範本，如控制使用下列範本內容。For complete control of the user interface (UI), you can define your own custom templates for the control using the following template properties. |樣板屬性Template property|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||樣板，含有針對動態功能表項目呈現的自訂內容。The template that contains the custom content to render for a dynamic menu item.| ||樣板，含有針對靜態功能表項目呈現的自訂內容。The template that contains the custom content to render for a static menu item.| 您可以設定來控制動態功能表相對於其父功能表項目垂直和水平位置和屬性，分別。You can control the vertical and horizontal position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item by setting the and properties, respectively. 若要控制靜態子功能表項目在靜態功能表內縮排，屬性。To control the indentation of the static submenu items within a static menu, use the property. ## 事件Events 控制項提供數個事件，您可以程式設計的。The control provides several events that you can program against. 這可讓您在事件發生時執行自訂的常式。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出支援的事件。The following table lists the supported events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生於按一下功能表項目。Occurs when a menu item is clicked. 此事件通常用來同步處理與頁面上的另一個控制項的控制項。This event is commonly used to synchronize a control with another control on the page.| ||發生於功能表項目繫結至資料。Occurs when a menu item is bound to data. 此事件通常用來修改功能表項目之前呈現在控制項。This event is commonly used to modify a menu item before it is rendered in a control.| ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192868)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192868). 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用宣告式語法的靜態功能表項目的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control with static menu items using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/CS/menudeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/VB/menudeclarativevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將繫結控制權傳輸至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the control to a control. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須為 Web.sitemap 檔案複製下面範例網站地圖資料。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data below to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/CS/menudatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/VB/menudatabindvb.aspx#1)] 以下是範例網站導覽資料先前的範例。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. ``` ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 若要以動態方式加入控制項的頁面，建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並再將它加入容器集合控制項，例如。To dynamically add a control to a page, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the collection of a container control, such as . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式將網頁的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a control to a page. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataBindings As MenuItemBindingCollection

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，這些物件會定義資料項目及它所繫結之功能表項目之間的關係。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that define the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to.

value.span: ，代表資料項目及它所繫結之功能表項目之間的關係。

span.span: A that represents the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含物件，定義資料項目及它所繫結功能表項目之間的關聯性。The collection contains objects that define the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to. 當繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目都包含多個屬性 （例如 XML 項目具有多個屬性），功能表項目會顯示所傳回的值`ToString()`方法的預設資料的項目。When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item by default. 在 XML 項目，功能表項目會顯示項目名稱，其中顯示基礎結構的樹狀目錄中，不過沒有非常有用。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以藉由指定功能表項目繫結，功能表項目繫結至特定的資料屬性。You can bind a menu item to a specific data item property by specifying menu item bindings. 當定義資料項目及功能表項目之間的關聯性，您必須指定繫結和資料項目的內容繫結至這兩個準則。When defining the relationship between a data item and a menu item, you must specify both the criteria for binding and the property of a data item to bind to. 功能表項目應該繫結資料的項目時，就會指出準則。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item. 可以使用深度、 資料成員，或兩者都指定準則。The criteria can be specified with a depth, a data member, or both. 深度會指定繫結的功能表層級。The depth specifies the menu level that gets bound. 例如，如果您指定深度為 0，所有功能表項目層級 0 的樹狀結構中會繫都結使用功能表項目繫結。For example, if you specify a depth of 0, all menu items in the tree structure at level 0 are bound using the menu item binding. 資料成員基礎資料來源中，指定資料的項目類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 例如，資料成員的 XML 項目會指定項目的名稱。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 若為多個物件定義與彼此衝突控制項適用於功能表項目繫結，以下列順序的優先順序：If multiple objects are defined that conflict with each other, the control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定義深度和資料成員的物件。The object that defines both a depth and a data member. 2. 定義只深度的物件。The object that defines only the depth. 3. 定義資料成員的物件。The object that defines only the data member. 4. 深度和資料成員都不會定義的物件。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. 一旦建立繫結準則，您就可以繫結的屬性能夠繫結至屬性或資料的項目欄位的物件。Once the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a object that is able to be bound to an attribute or field of a data item. 例如，您可以繫結屬性功能表項目文字的屬性上設定的 XML 項目屬性物件。For example, you can bind the property of a menu item to the text attribute on an XML element by setting the property of a object. 您也可以繫結至靜態值。You can also bind to a static value. 如果您設定屬性物件、 所有功能表項目要物件套用共用相同的靜態文字值。If you set the property of a object, all menu items to which the object is applied share the same static text value. 如需有關繫結的屬性物件的值，請參閱。For more information on binding the properties of a object to a value, see . 雖然以程式設計方式填入集合，則通常會以宣告方式設定。Although the collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively. 若要指定功能表項目繫結，第一次建立巢狀開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify the menu item bindings, first nest opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 接下來，將``開頭和結尾之間的項目``標記每個功能表項目的繫結，您想要指定。Next, place `` elements between the opening and closing `` tags for each menu item binding you want to specify. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合定義的欄位之間的關聯性控制項和功能表項目在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to define the relationship between the fields of an control and the menu items in a control. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須複製下列 XML 資料範例為 Map.xml 的檔案。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Map.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/CS/menubindingscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuBindings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuBindings/VB/menubindingsvb.aspx#1)] 以下是範例網站導覽資料先前的範例。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DisappearAfter { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當滑鼠指標不再位於功能表上之後，動態功能表顯示的持續期間。

span.span: Gets or sets the duration for which a dynamic menu is displayed after the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu.

value.span: 當滑鼠指標不再位於功能表上之後，動態功能表顯示的時間長度 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The amount of time (in milliseconds) a dynamic menu is displayed after the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu.

value.span: 預設值為 500。

span.span: The default is 500.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，動態功能表會自動消失當滑鼠指標不再位於功能表在特定期間之後。By default, a dynamic menu automatically disappears after a certain duration when the mouse pointer is no longer positioned over the menu. 使用屬性，以指定的持續時間。Use the property to specify the duration. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用者按一下功能表之外，動態功能表就會立即消失。A dynamic menu disappears immediately if the user clicks outside of the menu. 您也可以指定動態功能表應該永遠不會自動消失此屬性設定為-1。You can also specify that a dynamic menu should never automatically disappear by setting this property to -1. 在此情況下，只有當使用者按一下功能表外部，就會消失動態功能表項目。In this case, the dynamic menu item will disappear only when the user clicks outside the menu. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定動態功能表在使用者移動滑鼠指標離開功能表超過兩秒之後，應該就會消失。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that a dynamic menu should disappear after the user moves the mouse pointer away from the menu for more than two seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDisappearAfter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDisappearAfter/CS/menudisappearaftercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDisappearAfter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDisappearAfter/VB/menudisappearaftervb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The selected value is less than -1.

span.span: to display the built-in image for dynamic menu items with submenus; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當動態功能表項目包含子功能表時，可以顯示一個影像，表示使用者可以展開 [] 功能表中的滑鼠將游標放置功能表項目。When a dynamic menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu by positioning the mouse pointer over the menu item. 有兩種方式可顯示此映像：There are two ways to display this image: - 設定屬性`true`使用內建的映像 （預設值）。Set the property to `true` to use the built-in image (default). - 設定屬性來指定自訂映像。Set the property to specify a custom image. 如果屬性設定，則該影像會覆寫內建影像。If the property is set, that image overrides the built-in image. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性未設定而屬性設定為`false`，不會顯示影像。If the property is not set and the property is set to `false`, no image is displayed. 您可以藉由設定指定之影像的替代文字屬性。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. 當使用者將滑鼠指標停留在影像上時，此文字會顯示為工具提示。This text is displayed as a ToolTip when the user positions the mouse pointer over the image. 此文字也提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。This text also provides assistive technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性隱藏表示動態功能表項目具有子功能表的影像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the image that indicates that a dynamic menu item has a submenu. 屬性也必須設定為空字串 ("") 為隱藏，映像。The property must also be set to an empty string ("") for the image to be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicEnableDefaultPopOutImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicEnableDefaultPopOutImage/CS/menudynamicenabledefaultpopoutimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicEnableDefaultPopOutImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicEnableDefaultPopOutImage/VB/menudynamicenabledefaultpopoutimagevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DynamicHorizontalOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定讓動態功能表相對於其父功能表項目進行水平移位的像素數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of pixels to shift a dynamic menu horizontally relative to its parent menu item.

value.span: 讓動態功能表相對於其父功能表項目進行水平移位的像素數。

span.span: The number of pixels to shift a dynamic menu horizontally relative to its parent menu item.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來調整水平位置的動態功能表相對於其父功能表項目。Use the property to adjust the horizontal position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item. 這個屬性會影響以不同的方式取決於是否動態功能表的位置垂直或水平顯示控制項 (依指定屬性)。This property affects the position of a dynamic menu differently depending on whether the control is displayed vertically or horizontally (as specified by the property). 下表描述的差異。The following table describes the differences. |方向Orientation|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |水平Horizontal|根據預設，動態功能表會顯示其父功能表項目正下方。By default, a dynamic menu is displayed directly below its parent menu item. 設定這個屬性會讓動態功能表的位置水平從這個基底的位置。Setting this property shifts the dynamic menu position horizontally from this base position.| |垂直Vertical|根據預設，動態功能表項目會顯示任何之間沒有間距其父功能表項目旁。By default, a dynamic menu item is displayed next to its parent menu item without any spacing in between. 設定這個屬性會控制 [動態] 功能表和其父功能表項目之間的水平間距。Setting this property controls the horizontal spacing between the dynamic menu and its parent menu item.| > [!NOTE] > 您可以將這個屬性設為負值，讓動態功能表以負數方向。You can set this property to a negative value to shift a dynamic menu in a negative direction. 如果您要顯示垂直功能表，負值會導致動態功能表和其父功能表項目重疊。If you are displaying a vertical menu, a negative value causes a dynamic menu and its parent menu item to overlap. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定動態功能表和其父功能表項目之間有 5 像素的間隙。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a 5-pixel gap between a dynamic menu and its parent menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/CS/menudynamichorizontaloffsetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicHorizontalOffset/VB/menudynamichorizontaloffsetvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制動態功能表項目的外觀，當滑鼠指標移至上方。Use the property to control the appearance of a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`). 動態功能表項目的樣式屬性會套用順序如下：Style properties for a dynamic menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要將動態功能表項目的背景色彩變更為淺 sky 藍色，當使用者將滑鼠指標進入此屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the background color of a dynamic menu item to light sky blue when the user positions the mouse pointer over it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用調整動態功能表相對於其父功能表項目垂直位置的屬性。Use the property to adjust the vertical position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item. 這個屬性會影響以不同的方式取決於是否動態功能表的位置垂直或水平顯示控制項 (依指定屬性)。This property affects the position of a dynamic menu differently depending on whether the control is displayed vertically or horizontally (as specified by the property). 下表描述的差異。The following table describes the differences. |方向Orientation|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |水平Horizontal|根據預設，動態功能表會顯示其父功能表項目，沒有任何間距，兩者之間的正下方。By default, a dynamic menu is displayed directly below its parent menu item without any spacing in between. 設定這個屬性會控制 [動態] 功能表和其父功能表項目之間的垂直間距。Setting this property controls the vertical spacing between the dynamic menu and its parent menu item.| |垂直Vertical|根據預設，動態功能表項目是其父功能表項目旁顯示的上邊緣對齊。By default, a dynamic menu item is displayed next to its parent menu item with the top edges aligned. 設定這個屬性會讓動態功能表的位置從垂直這個基底的位置。Setting this property shifts the dynamic menu position vertically from this base position.| > [!NOTE] > 您可以將這個屬性設為負值，讓動態功能表以負數方向。You can set this property to a negative value to shift a dynamic menu in a negative direction. 如果您要顯示水平的功能表，負值會導致動態功能表和其父功能表項目重疊。If you are displaying a horizontal menu, a negative value causes a dynamic menu and its parent menu item to overlap. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用向下移動動態功能表 10 個像素會從其父功能表項目頂端的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to shift a dynamic menu down by 10 pixels from the top of its parent menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用的 CSS 樣式來控制它在瀏覽器的外觀。The control uses CSS styles to control its appearance in a browser. 根據預設，它會呈現`style`它會使用包含 CSS 定義的 CSS 類別的項目。By default, it renders a `style` element that contains the CSS definitions for the CSS classes that it uses. 您通常將此屬性設定為`false`在下列情況：You typically set this property to `false` in the following situations: - 您想要提供您自己的 CSS 定義自訂功能表的外觀。You want to provide your own CSS definitions in order to customize the appearance of the menu. 然後，您必須提供您自己的區塊的 CSS 定義在頁面中，或包含外部 CSS 檔案包含定義的連結。You must then provide your own block of CSS definitions in the page, or include a link to an external CSS file that contains the definitions. - 您想要保留的預設外觀，但想要產生的 CSS 定義維持在個別的檔案。You want to keep the default appearance but prefer to keep the generated CSS definitions in a separate file. 您必須提供檔案，並在它的連結。You must then provide the file and link to it. 在這些情況下，您可以取得一份預設 CSS 區塊，控制項屬性設定為產生`true`、 執行頁面上，並在瀏覽器中檢視網頁。In either of these situations, you can get a copy of the default CSS block that the control generates by setting the property to `true`, running the page, and viewing the page in a browser. 您可以檢視網頁原始檔中的瀏覽器和複本，並將 CSS 區塊貼入網頁標記的個別檔案。You can then view the page source in the browser and copy and paste the CSS block into the page markup or into a separate file. 如果您將此屬性設定為`false`，您無法設定樣式屬性。If you set this property to `false`, you cannot set style properties. 例如，您無法加入`DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`標記或集合中的屬性`DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`程式碼中的屬性。For example, you cannot add a `DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor` attribute in markup or set the `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor` property in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合，做為個別的樣式屬性的替代方式 (例如) 來控制在個別的功能表層級的功能表項目的樣式。Use the collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as ) to control the style of menu items at the individual levels of the menu. 這個集合中包含的樣式會套用至功能表層級為基礎的功能表項目。The styles contained in this collection are applied to the menu items based on their menu level. 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至第一個層級的功能表中功能表項目的樣式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of menu items in the first level of the menu. 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至功能表上，等等的第二個層級中的功能表項目的樣式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of menu items in the second level of the menu, and so on. 這個集合是最常用來產生內容樣式導覽功能表的其中的功能表項目在特定層級應該具有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子功能表。This collection is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果針對特定層級使用定義的樣式任何功能表項目集合，這個覆寫樣式該層級的功能表項目的設定。If a style is defined for a certain level using the collection, this overrides any menu item style settings for the menu items at that level. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用將樣式設定套用至功能表項目在集合控制項根據其層級。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to apply style settings to the menu items in a control based on their level. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuLevelMenuItemStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelMenuItemStyles/CS/menulevelmenuitemstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuLevelMenuItemStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelMenuItemStyles/VB/menulevelmenuitemstylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由設定靜態功能表中顯示多個功能表層級屬性設為大於 1 的值。You can display multiple menu levels in the static menu by setting the property to a value greater than 1. 您也可以將這個屬性的值大於 0，來顯示在動態功能表中的其他層級。You can also display additional levels in dynamic menus by setting this property to a value greater than 0. 例如，如果您在靜態功能表中顯示兩個功能表層級 (藉由設定屬性 2) 然後將此屬性設定為 3，三個層級會顯示在動態功能表中的其他功能表。For example, if you display two menu levels in the static menu (by setting the property to 2) and then set this property to 3, three additional menu levels are displayed in dynamic menus. 所有剩餘較高的功能表層級 （如果有的話） 會被捨棄。All remaining higher menu levels (if any) are discarded. > [!NOTE] > 將這個屬性設定為 0 就會顯示一般功能表到指定的層級屬性，沒有任何動態功能表。Setting this property to 0 displays a flat menu up to the level specified by the property, without any dynamic menus. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來限制在 1 動態功能表中顯示的功能表層級數目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to limit the number of menu levels to display in a dynamic menu to 1. 只有根功能表層級會顯示。Only the root menu level is displayed. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您存取的屬性引發事件的功能表項目。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to access the properties of the menu item that raised the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立事件處理常式顯示使用者所選取的功能表項目文字的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the event that displays the text of the menu item selected by the user. span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當通知由這個方法時，Web 伺服器控制項都必須執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在此階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，呼叫這個方法時，無論它是子系或父這個控制項。Additionally, you cannot access another server control when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不保證會建立並準備好存取其他伺服器控制項。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

summary.span: 取得或設定字元，用來分隔 控制項中功能表項目的路徑。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個功能表項目 (由物件) 中控制項有屬性，指定功能表項目的位置。Each menu item (represented by a object) in the control has a property that specifies the position of the menu item. 值路徑是分隔的值可形成根功能表項目目前的功能表項目路徑的字串。The value path is a string of delimited values that form the path from a root menu item to the current menu item. 使用屬性，以指定分隔字元用來分隔功能表路徑中的值。Use the property to specify the delimiting character used to separate the values in the menu path. 這個值通常用於剖析為個別值的清單。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values. 根據中顯示的文字控制項，以避免任何衝突變更，可能需要分隔符號字元。Depending on the text displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果您設定逗號分隔符號字元，所顯示的文字不應該包含任何逗號;否則，屬性無法正確剖析。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the property cannot be parsed accurately. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以逗點變更功能表項目的值路徑的分隔符號字元。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the delimiter character for a menu item's value path to a comma. summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定 控制項會呈現 HTML 項目和內嵌樣式，還是會呈現 項目和階層式樣式表 (CSS) 樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control renders HTML elements and inline styles, or elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles.

value.span: 一個值，指定 控制項會呈現 HTML 項目和內嵌樣式，還是會呈現 項目和階層式樣式表 (CSS) 樣式。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the control renders HTML elements and inline styles, or elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性會決定功能表控制項的標記的呈現方式控制項。The value of the property determines how the menu control renders markup for the control. 在 ASP.NET 3.5 和舊版中，控制項利用 HTML`table`項目和內嵌樣式，在瀏覽器中指定功能表的外觀。In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, the control uses HTML `table` elements and inline styles to specify the appearance of the menu in a browser. 在 ASP.NET 4 和更新版本中的，依預設控制項利用 HTML`listitem`項目和階層式樣式表 (CSS) 樣式。In ASP.NET 4 and later versions, by default the control uses HTML `listitem` elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles. 如果您未設定這個屬性，控制項呈現標記由所表示的 ASP.NET 版本適合屬性。If you do not set this property, the control renders markup that is appropriate to the ASP.NET version that is indicated by the property. 控制項會使用下列規則：The control uses the following rules: - 如果值屬性是`3.5`、控制項利用 HTML`table`項目和內嵌樣式。If the value of the property is `3.5`, the control uses HTML `table` elements and inline styles. - 如果值屬性是`4.0`或更多，控制項利用 HTML`listitem`項目和 CSS 樣式。If the value of the property is `4.0` or greater, the control uses HTML `listitem` elements and CSS styles. 這個屬性會提供回溯相容性。This property is provided for backward compatibility. 如果屬性會指出您想要產生為相容於 ASP.NET 4 或更新版本的 HTML 控制項，但您想要控制要使用先前的行為的例外狀況，您可以將此屬性設定為。If the property indicates that you want controls to generate HTML that is compatible with ASP.NET 4 or later, but you want the control to be an exception that uses earlier behavior, you can set this property to . 比方說，如果您有 Web 網頁會顯示由右至左的文字，您可能想要將此屬性設定為因為某些瀏覽器不會顯示模式標記正確地從右至左的文字。For example, if you have a Web page that displays text from right to left you might want to set this property to because some browsers do not display the mode markup properly for right-to-left text.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ScrollDownImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在動態功能表中之影像的 URL，表示使用者可以向下捲動以檢視其他功能表項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image displayed in a dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items.

value.span: 顯示在動態功能表中之影像的 URL，表示使用者可以向下捲動以檢視其他功能表項目。

span.span: The URL to an image displayed in a dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET 4.0 轉譯模式中不支援這個屬性。This property is not supported in the .NET 4.0 rendering mode. 如果這是必要屬性，您可以將功能表.NET 3.5 呈現模式中網頁的程式碼中加入下列：If this property is required, you can set the menu to the .NET 3.5 rendering mode by adding the following in the page's code: ``` menuInstance.RenderingCompatibility = new Version(3, 5); ``` 使用屬性來指定自訂映像底部的表示，使用者可以向下捲動其他功能表項目每個動態功能表顯示。Use the property to specify a custom image to display at the bottom of each dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items. > [!NOTE] > 如果這個屬性未設定，內部會使用預設映像。If this property is not set, the internal, default image is used. 您可以藉由設定指定之影像的替代文字屬性。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示使用者，可以動態功能表中的其他功能表項目向下捲動，指出自訂映像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a custom image indicating that the user can scroll down in a dynamic menu for additional menu items. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/CS/menuscrolldownimagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuScrollDownImage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuScrollDownImage/VB/menuscrolldownimagevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ScrollDownText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 屬性中所指定影像的替代文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text for the image specified in the property.

value.span: 屬性中所指定影像的替代文字。

span.span: The alternate text for the image specified in the property.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET 4.0 轉譯模式中不支援這個屬性。This property is not supported in the .NET 4.0 rendering mode. 如果這是必要屬性，您可以將功能表.NET 3.5 呈現模式中網頁的程式碼中加入下列：If this property is required, you can set the menu to the .NET 3.5 rendering mode by adding the following in the page's code: ``` menuInstance.RenderingCompatibility = new Version(3, 5); ``` 當動態功能表項目包含功能表底部的其他項目時，會顯示影像，表示使用者可以向上捲動到檢視其他功能表項目。When a dynamic menu item contains additional items at the bottom of the menu, an image is displayed to indicate that the user can scroll down to view additional menu items. 使用屬性來指定此映像的替代文字。Use the property to specify the alternate text for this image. 您指定的文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定用來表示，使用者可以向下捲動動態功能表中的其他功能表項目影像的替代文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for the image used to indicate that the user can scroll down in a dynamic menu for additional menu items. summary.span: 取得或設定隱藏影像的替代文字，讓螢幕助讀程式讀取以提供略過連結清單的能力。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.

value.span: 隱藏影像的替代文字，讓螢幕助讀程式讀取以提供略過連結清單的能力。

span.span: The alternate text of a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用螢幕助讀程式，讓您略過連結清單可以讀取屬性來指定隱藏影像的替代文字。Use the property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links. 您指定的文字會提供具有隱藏的描述的輔助技術裝置跳過可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的連結映像。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden skip link image that can be used to make the control more accessible. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 控制項提供屬性做為螢幕助讀程式所要略過整個控制項的方式。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果屬性設定，呈現不可見的影像的替代文字，讓使用者選擇跳至控制項的結尾。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control. 大聲閱讀，螢幕助讀程式讀取的替代文字和影像佔用一個像素的空間。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, and the image occupies only one pixel space. 像素精確控制呈現頁面的詳細資訊，請設定屬性設為空字串 ("")，並提供您自己的機制，以略過 功能表。For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the menu. 根據預設屬性設定為空字串。The property is set to the empty string by default. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用螢幕助讀程式，讓您略過連結清單可以讀取屬性來指定隱藏影像的替代文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuSkipLinkText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSkipLinkText/CS/menuskiplinktextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuSkipLinkText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuSkipLinkText/VB/menuskiplinktextvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果靜態功能表項目含有子功能表，可以顯示一個影像，表示使用者可以展開功能表。When a static menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu. 有兩種方式可顯示此映像：There are two ways to display this image: - 設定屬性`true`使用內建的映像 （預設值）。Set the property to `true` to use the built-in image (default). - 設定屬性來指定自訂映像。Set the property to specify a custom image. 如果屬性設定，則該影像會覆寫內建影像，不論值屬性。If the property is set, that image overrides the built-in image, regardless of the value of the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性未設定而屬性設定為`false`，不會顯示影像。If the property is not set and the property is set to `false`, no image is displayed. 您可以藉由設定指定之影像的替代文字屬性。You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性隱藏表示靜態功能表項目具有子功能表的影像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the image that indicates that a static menu item has a submenu. 屬性也必須設定為空字串 ("") 為隱藏，映像。The property must also be set to an empty string ("") for the image to be hidden. remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來控制使用者在靜態功能表中選取之功能表項目的外觀。Use the property to control the appearance of the menu item selected by the user in a static menu. 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性物件 (例如， `StaticSelectedStyle-ForeColor`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `StaticSelectedStyle-ForeColor`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `StaticSelectedStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `StaticSelectedStyle.ForeColor`). 靜態功能表項目的樣式屬性會套用順序如下：Style properties for a static menu item are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. 。. 如果集合或定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection or collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 3. 。. 如果定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。If the collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties. 4. 。. > [!IMPORTANT] > 下列重大變更。Breaking change below. .NET Framework 4.0，當定義之前``控制項在.aspx 檔案中，使用者可設定`StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`屬性來設定選取的控制項項目之 CSS 類別。Before .NET Framework 4.0, when defining an `` control in the .aspx file, users can set the `StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass` property to set the CSS class of the selected control item. 例如，使用者可能會有功能表控制項，如下所示：For example, user may have a menu control as below: ``` ``` 與此功能表控制項轉譯為：And the menu control is rendered as: ```
  • item_0
  • itme_1
``` 不過，在.NET Framework 4.0 及更新版本中，選取的功能表項目會設定為`selected`CSS 類別，而所指定的類別不一定是`StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`。However, in .NET Framework 4.0 and later, the selected menu item is set to the `selected` CSS class always instead of the class specified by `StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`. 因此，上述的 ASP.NET 程式碼會改為轉譯成：Therefore, the above ASP.NET code is rendered instead as: ```
  • item_0
  • itme_1
``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定選取靜態功能表項目的淺藍色背景色彩。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a light blue background color for the selected static menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷相關聯的值控制項。Use the property to determine the value that is associated with a control. 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。This property is used primarily by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示與功能表項目關聯之 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item.

value.span: 在其中顯示連結 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，以顯示 Web 內容會連結至功能表項目，按一下該功能表項目時。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. 除了以底線為開頭的某些特殊值以外，值必須以 A 到 Z (不區分大小寫) 範圍內的字母為開頭，如下表所示。Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. |目標值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Internet Explorer 版本 5.0 和更新版本支援`_search`目標值For example, Internet Explorer versions 5.0 and above support the `_search` target value 這個屬性會套用至所有功能表項目在控制項。This property applies to all menu items in a control. 您可以選擇性地覆寫這個屬性設定每個屬性直接物件。You can selectively override this property by setting the property of each object directly. > [!NOTE] > 屬性轉譯成目標屬性。The property renders as a target attribute. XHTML 1.1 嚴格的文件類型定義中不允許錨定項目上的目標屬性。The target attribute on anchor elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 strict document type definition. 如果轉譯的輸出必須符合 XHTML 或協助工具標準，請勿設定屬性。If rendered output must conform to XHTML or accessibility standards, do not set the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)和[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定內容連結至每個功能表項目應該顯示在新視窗中，當使用者按一下該功能表項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the content linked to each menu item should be displayed in a new window when the user clicks that menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuTarget/CS/menutargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuTarget/VB/menutargetvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 追蹤 控制項的檢視狀態變更，以便可將其儲存在該控制項的 物件中。

span.span: Tracks view-state changes to the control so they can be stored in the control's object.
